title: Black man down
creator_credit: Bill McCrow, Bruce Redman and Sam Watson
brief_description: ‘Black man down’ is a perilous journey into the Aboriginal psyche. It is a journey to the roots of time that expands and pulses with dark, mysterious energies. A young warrior, alone in a prison cell, is plagued and confronted by the ghosts of his past and spirits of the land. Death calls to him with a silken tongue, the sprits urge him to live….
